abstract: Temporal reasoning is fundamental for large language models (LLMs) to comprehend the world. Current temporal reasoning datasets are limited to questions about single or isolated events, falling short in mirroring the realistic temporal …

title: Synth-SBDH: A Synthetic Dataset of Social and Behavioral Determinants of Health for Clinical Text
details: A Mitra, E Druhl, R Goodwin, H Yu - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.06056, 2024
abstract: Social and behavioral determinants of health (SBDH) play a crucial role in health outcomes and are frequently documented in clinical text. Automatically extracting SBDH information from clinical text relies on publicly available good-quality datasets …
